pkgmetadata.longdescription: A python library for querying and updating a stash sqlite databasepystashlib and Stash compatibility table:| pystashlib | Stash version | Stash schema || ------------- | ------------- | ------------- || v0.3.0-v0.3.1 | v0.17.0-v0.17.2 | 36 || v0.2.8 | v0.15.0-v0.16.1 | 31 || v0.2.7 | v0.14.0 | 30 || v0.2.5 | v0.12.0-v0.13.1 | 29 || v0.2.4 | v0.11.0 | 28 |# Changelog## v0.3.1* Removed tree_from_file and scrape functions from stashlib.common to remove dependency on lxml
